languages.text: "Мы полностью принимаем свою вину, Ваша Светлость. Нашему небрежению нет прощения. Дозвольте загладить свою вину перед вами безукоризненной службой и тщанием в делах".

traits.locale_text: "Мы полностью принимаем свою вину, Ваша Светлость. Нашему небрежению нет прощения. Дозвольте загладить свою вину перед вами безукоризненной службой и тщанием в делах".
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: "We fully accept our responsibility, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Our negligence was unforgivable. Allow us to make amends through impeccable service and diligence."
languages.original_text: "Мы полностью принимаем свою вину, Ваша Светлость. Нашему небрежению нет прощения. Дозвольте загладить свою вину перед вами безукоризненной службой и тщанием в делах".

traits.locale_text: "We fully accept our responsibility, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Our negligence was unforgivable. Allow us to redeem ourselves before you with impeccable service and utmost endeavour."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: "We fully accept our responsibility, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Our negligence was unforgivable. Allow us to redeem ourselves before you with impeccable service and utmost endeavour."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: "We fully accept our responsibility, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Our negligence was unforgivable. Allow us to make amends through impeccable service and diligence."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: "We fully accept our responsibility, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Our negligence was unforgivable. Allow us to make amends through impeccable service and diligence."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: "We fully accept our responsibility, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Our negligence was unforgivable. Allow us to make amends through impeccable service and diligence."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: "We fully accept our responsibility, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Our negligence was unforgivable. Allow us to make amends through impeccable service and diligence."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: «Aceptamos plenamente nuestra responsabilidad, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Nuestra negligencia es imperdonable. Permítanos expiar nuestra culpa con diligencia y un servicio intachable».
languages.original_text: "We fully accept our responsibility, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Our negligence was unforgivable. Allow us to make amends through impeccable service and diligence."

traits.locale_text: «Aceptamos plenamente nuestra responsabilidad, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Nuestra negligencia es imperdonable. Permítanos expiar nuestra culpa con diligencia y un servicio intachable».
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: “我们愿意承担我们的罪责，大人。我们犯下了不可原谅的疏忽，请您允许我们通过孜孜不倦的服务与辛劳弥补过错。”
languages.original_text: "We fully accept our responsibility, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Our negligence was unforgivable. Allow us to make amends through impeccable service and diligence."

traits.locale_text: “我们愿意承担我们的罪责，大人。我们犯下了不可原谅的疏忽，请您允许我们通过孜孜不倦的服务与辛劳弥补过错。”
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: « Nous acceptons totalement notre responsabilité, Votre Seigneurie. Notre négligence est impardonnable. Permettez-nous de nous racheter en nous montrant désormais irréprochables. »
languages.original_text: "We fully accept our responsibility, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Our negligence was unforgivable. Allow us to make amends through impeccable service and diligence."

traits.locale_text: « Nous acceptons totalement notre responsabilité, Votre Seigneurie. Notre négligence est impardonnable. Permettez-nous de nous racheter en nous montrant désormais irréprochables. »
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: 「我々の責任は全面的に認めます。その過失は許しがたいものでした。今後の完璧な奉仕と勤勉によって償うことをお許しください」
languages.original_text: "We fully accept our responsibility, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Our negligence was unforgivable. Allow us to make amends through impeccable service and diligence."

traits.locale_text: 「我々の責任は全面的に認めます。その過失は許しがたいものでした。今後の完璧な奉仕と勤勉によって償うことをお許しください」
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: "Wir akzeptieren unsere Verantwortung ohne jede Einschränkung, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Unsere Nachlässigkeit war unverzeihlich. Gestattet uns, durch makellosen Dienst und größte Sorgfalt Buße zu tun."
languages.original_text: "We fully accept our responsibility, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Our negligence was unforgivable. Allow us to make amends through impeccable service and diligence."

traits.locale_text: "Wir akzeptieren unsere Verantwortung ohne jede Einschränkung, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Unsere Nachlässigkeit war unverzeihlich. Gestattet uns, durch makellosen Dienst und größte Sorgfalt Buße zu tun."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: "Sorumluluğu tamamen üzerimize alıyoruz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. İhmalkârlığımız affedilemez. Size kusursuz bir şekilde hizmet edip özenle çalışarak kendimizi affettirmemize izin verin."
languages.original_text: "We fully accept our responsibility, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Our negligence was unforgivable. Allow us to make amends through impeccable service and diligence."

traits.locale_text: "Sorumluluğu tamamen üzerimize alıyoruz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. İhmalkârlığımız affedilemez. Size kusursuz bir şekilde hizmet ederek ve özen göstererek kendimizi affettirmemize izin verin."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum
